original_title: Shut Up And Get in the Car!
overview: Simon (Michael J. Vogelsang) and Fred (Evan Jacobs) are as different as brothers can be. Simon is married, calm and reserved. Fred is high strung, loud and always feels the need to express his opinions. Their “Odd Couple” pairing is put to the test when Fred drives Simon to their mother’s house for Thanksgiving. What follows are laughs, arguments and many detours as the brothers attempt to Shut Up and Get In The Car!
title: Shut Up And Get in the Car!
